tool_description: Analyzes error patterns, HTTP status codes, and failure rates during load testing to identify system reliability issues.

log_sources.description: List of log file paths or endpoints to analyze for errors

error_categories.description: Types of errors to track and categorize

time_window_minutes.description: Time window for error analysis in minutes (1-1440)

error_messages: Log source inaccessible: Unable to access one or more specified log sources
Invalid error categories: Use valid error category names
Invalid time window: Must be between 1 and 1440 minutes
usage: Specify log_sources array with paths to log files or monitoring endpoints. Configure error_categories and time_window_minutes to customize error analysis scope.

analysis_id.description: Unique identifier for this error analysis

error_rate_percent.description: Overall error rate as percentage of total requests

most_common_error.description: Most frequently occurring error type or message
